word:
Chap. 81 - To Brethren

                                                           B-1-1890 

                                   St. Helena, Calif., May 14, 1890 Dear Brethren,-- 
     I have been deeply burdened in regard to the manner in which Vol. IV, "The Great Controversy," has been treated by our canvassers, because it has so long been kept from the field. It is nearly two years since the new edition was completed, and but little has been done to bring it before the people.
